ygData.subject: Flirting
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail sisters of Norrath! Oh yes, flirting seems to occur every now and then for my dwarven cleric, though it is somewhat infrequent, probably due to my dwarven
ygData.messageBody:
Hail sisters of Norrath!
Oh yes, flirting seems to occur every now and then for my dwarven cleric,
though it is somewhat infrequent, probably due to my dwarven looks (or lack
there of :) Most people flirting with me seem to get into it after a few
rounds of conversation in character, so maybe I have more charms than my
charisma seems to show... Disa, my dwarven cleric, isn't really a flirt but
she does have somewhat of a weak spot for wood elves and especially gallant
behaviour. After being escorted by an ogre warrior across Antonica, she did
even develop a sweet spot for him! Disa is otherwise more into the grind of
battle and the healing and casting business, though she enjoys the verbal
sparring of flirting none the less if the opportunity presents itself.
The " r u a girl in rl" seems to happen less now than it used to... In beta
when I was a half elf ranger, I had several comments on my bust size... Now
my bust is about the same, but my legs are shorter so maybe that's why I
don't hear the wolf whistles :)
I haven't had any real problems with sexism, but I guess the /ignore has to
be good for something :)

Good hunting to all sisters!
Disa
